application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Horse Chestnut (Aesculus hippocastanum)	Reduce by 2-3m back to most previous reduction points. Final height 13m and spread 8mMixed Species	From pumphouse to T(3) - all shrubs and small trees - Fell and grind	Remove low limb at 5m to north.Remove secondary limb at 7m to north west (forking 1m from primary limb at 6.5m to north west). Reduce remaining crown back to previous reduction points, removing approx 3-4m. Final height unchanged at 18m, final spread 12m.Weeping Willow (Salix babylonica)	Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 4m of new growth. Final height 6m and spread 5mT8 (TPO T16 (question))	Horse Chestnut (Aesculus hippocastanum)	Reduce overhang to roof of No.1 Fairways back to boundary line, removing 2m of growth. Remove low epicormic growth on main stem, raise crown all round by 2-3m. Final height unchanged at 16m, final spread 8m.
